response.overview: Manuel is the owner of a funeral home inherited from his parents after his death. He rises daily to close the lives of the deceased and comfort the family. Don Francisco arrives one day at the funeral home with the intention of planning his funeral. Manuel considers his daily life too strange. Over time he becomes calmer and helps the client find the perfect casket. Manuel at that moment understands that the purpose of the funeral is to propel souls towards a new beginning and that the deceased receive the farewell so that they can pass peacefully to eternal life.
response.title: Funerales Paz
